                     throws JwtSecretNotFoundException
        Parses a jwt token.
        Parameters:
        jwt - token to be parsed.
        Returns:
        the parsed token.
        Throws:
        JwtSecretNotFoundException - if the jwt secret is not specified
        io.jsonwebtoken.JwtException - if the given token is expired, malformed, unsupported or wrongly signed
        IllegalArgumentException - if the jwt token is not specified.
